title: The State of the Charts with Benjamin Cowen
description:
It's that time again. Time to dive into the charts, this time with Benjamin Cowen. With energy flooding into the space, and prices at the top of everyone's mind, Benjamin brings his consistent, disciplined approach to Bankless listeners.

Dive in as we explore what Benjamin looks for in the markets, and what the state of crypto prices are today. What does the rest of this market cycle hold in store? No one knows for sure, but Benjamin's insights will sharpen our prospects.

------
OPOLIS | YOUR CRYPTO CAREER
https://bankless.cc/Opolis 

------
SUBSCRIBE TO NEWSLETTER: https://newsletter.banklesshq.com/ 
️ SUBSCRIBE TO PODCAST: http://podcast.banklesshq.com/ 
------

BANKLESS SPONSOR TOOLS:

️ ARBITRUM | SCALING ETHEREUM
https://bankless.cc/Arbitrum 

MATCHA | DECENTRALIZED EXCHANGE AGGREGATOR
https://bankless.cc/Matcha 

LEDGER | SECURE YOUR ASSETS
https://bankless.cc/Ledger 

ALCHEMIX | SELF-PAYING LOANS
http://bankless.cc/Alchemix 

------
Topics Covered:

0:00 Intro
9:00 Into the Cryptoverse
14:25 Market Cycles
21:58 BTC Controls the Market
28:51 Supercycle?
37:20 Blow-Off Tops
40:35 Much Much Time Left?
47:53 Catalysts and Events
54:00 Ethereum Cycles
58:45 Bitcoin Dominance
1:03:50 The Flippening
1:11:29 Blue Chip Assets
1:17:49 Advice
1:21:07 Closing & Disclaimers

------
